content: Culture always starts at the top. Looking in from the outside the CEO seems like he is a little immature for the task. The news is never good from Uber and the CEO is always putting out fires. Maybe he needs to concentrate on the business a little more and think before he speaks. It is also a good idea for him to walk the halls of Uber and talk to employees, get a feel for what the happiness quotient is. Miserable employees can sink a ship…the misery can be shared.
